trans-unit.source: Specifies the placement of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar" /> with respect to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o posicionamento de uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar" /> com relação ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement> enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement> enumeração é usada para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.

trans-unit.source: The actual position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> é definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property identifies this position so that the ticks of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> are drawn correctly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> propriedade identifica nesta posição para que as marcas de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> são desenhados corretamente.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> controls are drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property is set to Top and Bottom.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> controles são desenhados quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> propriedade for definida como superior e inferior.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement.Top> that is included in the <xref:System.Windows.Style> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBarPlacement.Top> que está incluído no <xref:System.Windows.Style> de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, consulte [modelos e estilos de controle deslizante](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada abaixo da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned to the left of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada à esquerda da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned to the right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada à direita da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned above the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada acima da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Slider" />.
